publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5944 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme—That the Parliament congratulates the Urban Fox Programme based in the east end of Glasgow on receiving a commitment of £95,000 for the next three years from BBC Children In Need; recognises the continuing good work of Michael McCourt and the Urban Fox team in providing activities for young people in the east end and welcomes the initiative to develop training opportunities for young people as part of the ongoing programme, and wishes the Urban Fox well in its work over the coming years.

S3M-5944 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme—That the Parliament congratulates the Urban Fox Programme based in the east end of Glasgow on receiving a commitment of £95,000 for the next three years from BBC Children In Need; recognises the continuing good work of Michael McCourt and the Urban Fox team in providing activities for young people in the east end and welcomes the initiative to develop training opportunities for young people as part of the ongoing programme, and wishes the Urban Fox well in its work over the coming years.

S3M-5944Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme (lodged on 11 March 2010) Karen Whitefield*, Jackie Baillie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Mulligan*, James Kelly*
S3M-5944 Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme (lodged on 11 March 2010) Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*, Sandra White*
S3M-5944 Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme (lodged on 11 March 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-5944 Congratulations to the Urban Fox Programme (lodged on 11 March 2010) David Stewart*
